title: My other main acc has been perma banned.
body:
Hello everyone who are reading this,before you get too into the text i just want to tell you that i dont want to be lectured if you're going to reply to this,im simply just asking for advice.

Okay so my old and very missed account had been perma banned almost a year ago now. It was because of my toxic personality. I saw it coming that i would be banned because they had suspended me for 2 weeks twice. I now understand that if i want to play the game i will need to stop with my attitude. I spent alot of money into that account 
because i was foolish enough to not realize its a game and i really could do better things with my money.
I spent around 500 dollars on that account ( not joking. ) and as you can see by that,i was really into the game. Mostly bought skins.
I wonder that if now i have learned my lesson and are much more mature and less salty about everything,is there a way 
to get my account back?
If i email riot games and explain to them almost the exact same thing as i said in this post,could i have a slight chance of getting the account back?
Thanks for reading this,and as i said i dont want any people to try to lecture me when replying to this post. It isnt 
necessary and it wont help anyone.

Again,thanks! {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

Btw,if this is posted in the wrong section then feel free to move it.

replies.body: Unfortunately there is no way to get your account back after getting perma banned, sorry.
This. They only unban accounts if the ban was unjust. Unfortunately, reforming doesnt qualify. (From everything ive read over the last two years on this board)

Unfortunately Riot's policy is that they only overturn or lessen punishments that were in error.

EDIT: Ninja'd XD That is what I get for not checking if anyone has posted after having the tab up a couple minutes.
Damn all that time and money gone for good.

Also by the way the match i was banned from was just me being in my own random team against a 
pre-made one and they started harassing me and i tried to defend myself.
All 5 of them reported me and it resulted in me getting banned. This isnt fair

Fire with fire rarely (if ever) works. It just makes the situation worse. Perma means permanent there is no getting the account back, sorry. I've spent much more, and i do what i can to keep my account, muting is defending yourself, flaming is retaliating. Just remember this old proverb, "An eye for an eye, and the whole world goes blind"
You don't deserve it back though.
And why not? I did that mistake almost a year ago. I had spent almost 10 000 swedish crowns on that account and they wont even give me my money back.

So what? It doesn't matter how long ago it is. No one cares. You had multiple chances.

Why did you say "my money"? It's not your money. You willingly gave it to Riot. They have no obligation to give you money for free for no reason.

Get over it.

Lol first of all i already said if you're gonna be rude i dont want you replying to my post so why the fuck are you here?
Second of all,it is my money since i put them as rp and then buy skins for them. It is my money,get over it.

Well no. If you went to a store and bought some clothes, then paid with money, that money wouldn't be yours anymore, right ? You get your clothes, the store gets the money. Well here it's the same; you bought skins (so basically clothing for your champs) and gave Riot money in exchange. You get skins, Riot gets money.

> is there a way to get my account back?

nope.
